answers.text:
Hi Ed,
Thanks for reaching out to ICMA with your question! 
I was able to find an agenda-setting guide from South Sioux City, Nebraska that I think might be helpful for your coworkers in Chula Vista. You can check it out here: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303532/South_Sioux_City_Agenda_Process_Manual. 
I hope that this guide helps you, but if you would like further clarifications, please review the Council Agendas topic page.  Also, please check back in with us to let us know how implementing Legistar!
Aloha, 
Jim Davidson
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
jdavidson@icma.org

author: Edward Chew
text:
The City of Chula Vista has recently implemented Legistar paperless agenda software. During our process improvement events one of the issues which was identified as causing delays in the agenda submittal process was that staff oftentimes submitted poorly written reports. We are going to offer training to our employees and I was wondering if any agencies had developed a agenda/staff report writing guide for issues being presented to your City Council/Board for action. Any help would be appreciated.
Thank You.
title: Staff/Agenda Report Writing Guide
